```{r}
x=read.csv('./data/DailyDelhiClimateTrain.csv')
tem=ts(x$meantemp)
```

```{r}
plot(tem)
```

```{r}
library(xts)
tem=xts(x$meantemp,as.Date(x$date))
plot(tem)
```

```{r}
acf(tem)
```

```{r}
tem=to.weekly(tem)
plot(tem$tem.High)
```
```{r}
acf(tem$tem.High)
```
```{r}
pacf(tem$tem.High)
```

```{r}
plot(x$humidity)
```

```{r}
hum=xts(x$humidity,as.Date(x$date))
plot(hum)
```
```{r}
acf(hum)
pacf(hum)
```
